verses.name: Leviticus 27:16
verses.text: And if a man shall sanctify unto the Lord some part of a field of his possession, then thy estimation shall be according to the seed thereof: an homer of barley seed shall be valued at fifty shekels of silver.

verses.name: Leviticus 27:17
verses.text: If he sanctify his field from the year of jubile, according to thy estimation it shall stand.

verses.name: Leviticus 27:18
verses.text: But if he sanctify his field after the jubile, then the priest shall reckon unto him the money according to the years that remain, even unto the year of the jubile, and it shall be abated from thy estimation.
